item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Temple Downtown on Francis Street (underneath the Renaissance Providence Hotel across from the State House).

I've been here for dinner during Restaurant Week last year (which was great) and a couple times for drinks and trivia. Apparently they have changed the decor and gone to an "Inspired Mediterranean Cuisine & Mixology" offering. The bar area is huge and there's LOT's o' room, so I'm anxious to see if its changed that much. I remember when it was an abandoned building - even then it looked like a great space, and look at it now. Its history is pretty interesting too, so let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear some kind of scarf, but you can't miss us!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Temple!
